A

Actor - Class in bonzai.api
An Actor describes the properties of a character in the game and gives you functions to control them if you are able.
Actor(TrueActor, int) - Constructor for class bonzai.api.Actor
Creates an Actor.
AI - Interface in bonzai.api
This is an interface which your AI must implement to run.

AIGameState provides functions to get information and objects present in the world each turn.

Cleaner - Class in bonzai.api
Cleaners are Actors that have the ability to force Blockers into an unblocking position and to stun them for 6 turns.

M

MANA_COST_ANIMATE - Static variable in class bonzai.api.Wizard
This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on a Neutral Actor and the cost to teleport your hat back to your base if another team gained possession of your hat.
MANA_COST_DEANIMATE - Static variable in class bonzai.api.Wizard
This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on an Actor that another player owns, with the exception of another player's hat.
MANA_COST_DISMISS - Static variable in class bonzai.api.Wizard
This is the cost to use Wizard.castMagic() on an Actor you own.
